name: Clown Rancher
description:
An ultra-minimalist "idle" game of buying rapidly appearing upgrades before you run out of time! Every 10 seconds, a new type of clown can be purchased! Milk clowns for their delicious Clown Milk! How much money can you get in 120 seconds? 

Made for Ludum Dare. Due to scheduling, I made this game in ~3 hours. It has no graphics or audio. It does contain clowns though.

Link to the Ludum Dare Page
